column4: もうすぐ……
もうすぐだ……

われらの長き
不ぐうの時代は
column6: Tonight, our long era of misfortune will finally end.

column4: こよい終わりを告げる
偉大なるハオウ、デス・ファントムよ
column6: O Death Phantom, our great ruler,
column8: O Death Phantom, our great ruler,

column4: われらをみちびきたまえ……
しゅびよくいったようだな……
セーラー戦士のジャマは入りましたが
column6: The Sailor +Senshi+Soldiers+ have interfered, but we've not failed.

column4: ぬかりはありません……
フッ……ろくに使いこなすこともできなかった男には
column6: Heh. A useless trinket in the hands of a man who cannot handle its power.
column8: Heh. A useless trinket in the hands of a man

column4: 無用の長物よ……
それは……きさまとて同じだ……
column6: It won't be...any different for you...
column8: It won't be...any different for you...

column4: 黒水晶の力をフルに引き出すことはオレはもとより
column6: If I couldn't draw out the full power of the Black Crystal, then neither can you...
column8: If I couldn't draw out the full power of the Black Crystal,

column4: きさまにもできん……！
それができるのは……
column6: The only one who could is―
column8: The only one who could is―

column4: ……へらず口がたたけるのも今のうちだ……
column6: ...I hope you've enjoyed flapping your mouth while you can...
column8: ...I hope you've enjoyed flapping your mouth while you could...

column4: 二度とその口
きけぬようにしてくれるわ……
column6: ―you won't have such luxury any longer...
column8: you won't have such luxury any longer...

column4: やめ……
ぐっ……！
やめろおーーー！
